channel.title: NYS:VIA on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:VIA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Citymapper App Owner Via Falls 4.3% After $492.9 Million IPO
item.description: Via Transportation Inc. shares opened 4.3% below their initial public offering price after the public transportation software maker and some of its backers raised $492.9 million.
